item.description:
Meet us at Cafe on the Corner for a couple of hours of conversation en francais! (How do you translate "Groundhog Day"?!)

Park on Central Avenue in front of the Cafe or on Third Street, around the corner. I'll sit at a table near the door until about 7:15, or until it looks like all RSVPed members have arrived.

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: February French Speakers Meetup #1
